title: Enchanting Neelam & Diamond Floral Drop Earrings
features: These earrings feature a floral design with meticulously set diamonds surrounding a central Tanzanite (Neelam) at the top. A pear-shaped blue gemstone dangles below. This design is a modern take on traditional South Indian 'Butta' (dome-shaped earrings) incorporating contemporary diamond setting.
colors: Predominantly blue (Tanzanite and pear-shaped gemstone) and white (Diamonds). The 18KT gold adds a touch of warmth to the overall cool color scheme.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings
and formal events. Can also be worn to modern gatherings for a sophisticated touch.
description: The unique combination of Tanzanite and diamonds creates a striking visual appeal. The contemporary design makes it versatile for both traditional and modern outfits. The gemstones are carefully selected for their color and clarity, ensuring a high-quality piece.
